Title: pg_ls_logicalsnapdir
Feature: pg_ls_logicalsnapdir () â†’ setof record ( name text, size bigint, modification timestamp with time zone )
Description: Returns the name, size, and last modification time (mtime) of each ordinary file in the server's pg_logical/snapshots directory. Filenames beginning with a dot, directories, and other special files are excluded.
This function is restricted to superusers and members of the pg_monitor role by default, but other users can be granted EXECUTE to run the function.
